FuncDef: The reset extended-system-software next-startup command clears the extended system package setting for the next startup. The reset extended-system-software next-startup command clears the extended system package setting for the next startup. By default, the specified extension package for the next startup is cleared.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an extended system package.
The value is a string of 5 to 127 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.
